function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The large-scale population movement from Hubei Province via trains increases the risk of disease spread.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to high population movement.","Mitigation":"Implement travel restrictions or health screenings for individuals traveling from Hubei Province.","Technologies":"Health screening technology, travel restriction technology.","People":"Population traveling from Hubei Province.","Owner":"Government, transportation authorities."},{"Description":"Density of points of interest (POIs) around railway stations increases face-to-face contact and potential disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission due to increased face-to-face contact.","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures around railway stations, encourage use of face masks and hand hygiene.","Technologies":"Social distancing monitoring technology, face mask detection technology.","People":"Individuals in proximity to railway stations.","Owner":"Local authorities, city planners."},{"Description":"Population flow from Hubei Province and number of flights from Hubei increase the risk of disease spread between cities.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission between cities due to increased population flow.","Mitigation":"Implement travel restrictions, quarantine measures, and health screenings for individuals traveling from Hubei Province.","Technologies":"Travel restriction technology, quarantine monitoring technology.","People":"Population traveling from Hubei Province.","Owner":"Government, transportation authorities."}]}
